metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5407 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
Simultaneous Multi-threading (SMT) in processors can enable local users to exploit software vulnerable to timing attacks via a side-channel timing attack on 'port contention'.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5407` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libssl1.1 - 1.1.1-1ubuntu2
openssl - 1.1.1-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Billy Bob Brumley, Cesar Pereida Garcia, Sohaib ul Hassan, Nicola Tuveri, Alejandro Cabrera Aldaya

notes.Note: mdeslaur> this is a hardware issue, but openssl did commit a workaround in 1.1.1, 1.1.0i

criterions.comment: openssl package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.1-1ubuntu2').
